titles.histoire: Our story : born in the French Alps
titles.404: Sorry, this page does not exist

home.h1: AN ORIGINAL CONCEPT CREATED IN THE HEART OF FRENCH ALPS
home.p1: Created in 2007, O'Tacos is the first #FrenchTacos restaurant chain.
home.p2: In every O'Tacos, find our original cheese sauce recipe and choose among our 5 HALAL certified meats, rigorously chosen for their premium quality.
home.p3: To satisfy each and every, we have created O'Tacos of all sizes, weighing as heavy as 2.500kg for the bravest.

promos.else: There is not any promotions in your country for now...

restaurants.h1: Where to eat our delicious O'Tacos

caracteristics: A never ending search for inovation
A real win-win agreement with our partners
yearsdesc: Idea coming from Grenoble in the french alps
Restructuring : 92% customer satisfaction, presence on social medias : 36 000 fans in a month
Optimization of our expertise, goal : 5 restaurants à l'international
200 restaurants in the world, cost optimization, new central purchasing center, Franchisee masters, 1000000 fans

argRight.p1: Our communication department works every day to develop the reputation of our brand and the O'Tacos network with exceptional results on social networks with more than 1.0000.000 fans on Facebook, m6 TV spots, local campaigns, and marketing, powerfully carried by many ambassadors of the brand.
argRight.p2: A true interface between the franchisee and the O'Tacos franchisees, the network animator occupies a complete and essential position in the network, responsible for the upholding of the concept, he is initiator of dialogue and dynamism within the network, he must constantly juggle with everyone's expectations having the main objective of obtaining the individual and collective success of its members.

footer.warning: For your health, practice regular physical activity
